publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3056 Murdo Fraser: Agricultural Road Safety—That the Parliament welcomes the forthcoming introduction of a code of practice for the safe use of agricultural machinery on roads; recognises the input of Tayside Police, the Scottish Contractors Association and the Perthshire Machinery Ring in the preparation of the code, and supports the aim of the code, which is to improve safety awareness and the prevention of road accidents involving agricultural vehicles.
S1M-3056 Agricultural Road Safety (lodged on 30 April 2002) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-3056 Agricultural Road Safety (lodged on 30 April 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Alex Johnstone*

S1M-3056 Murdo Fraser: Agricultural Road Safety—That the Parliament welcomes the forthcoming introduction of a code of practice for the safe use of agricultural machinery on roads; recognises the input of Tayside Police, the Scottish Contractors Association and the Perthshire Machinery Ring in the preparation of the code, and supports the aim of the code, which is to improve safety awareness and the prevention of road accidents involving agricultural vehicles. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Donald Gorrie, Alex Johnstone
